Play with numeric.js:
{"doc":"
cls 
\ Linear algebra example. We start with a matrix.
<js>
var A = [[1,2,3],
         [4,5,6],
         [7,3,9]]; A </jsV> value A

\ Let's also make a vector.
<js> var x = [3,1,2]; x </jsV> value x

\ Matrix-vector product.  b = A (.) x
<js> var b = numeric.dot(vm.g.A,vm.g.x); b </jsV> value b b (see)

\ Matrix inverse.  ~A 
<js> var Ainv = numeric.inv(vm.g.A); Ainv </jsV> value Ainv 
Ainv (see)

\ Let's check it:   ~A (.) b = x Bingo!!!!
<js> numeric.dot(vm.g.Ainv,vm.g.b); </jsV> (see)

\ Determinant
<js> numeric.det(vm.g.A); </jsV> cr tib. 

\ Sin wave
<js> var x = numeric.linspace(0,6.3,25); x </jsV> to x x (see)

<js> var y = numeric.sin(vm.g.x); y </jsV> value y y (see)




stop
js> numeric tib.

stop
js> vm.appname=="jeforth.3hta" [if] char js/numeric-1.2.6.js
[else] char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.js [then]
readTextFile \ 先讀取 .js 檔, 但不能直接用
<text> 
window.numeric = numeric;  // 先對 source 做一點必要的加工, 把 numeric 掛上 global 
</text> + </js> \ 然後才執行	

stop
\ Also hosted on BootCDN.cn
\ http://cdn.bootcss.com/numeric/1.2.6/numeric.js

\ These lines works fine! Test ok on 3ce, 3hta ADO reads only local files
\ so the path should be only "js/numeric-1.2.6.js",

char     http://localhost:8888/js/numeric-1.2.6.js     readTextFile tib.
char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.js     readTextFile tib.
char http://www.numericjs.com/lib/numeric-1.2.6.min.js readTextFile tib.


","mode":true,"readonly":false}
用 currentStyle 查 HTML element 的 style:
{"doc":"\n

* Chrome browser does not have currentStyle property, IE and HTA only

> js> outputbox.currentStyle .
[object MSCurrentStyleCSSProperties] OK
> js> outputbox.currentStyle obj>keys .
blockDirection,clipBottom,clipLeft,clipRight,clipTop,hasLayout,accelerator,backgroundPositionX,backgroundPositionY,behavior,filter,imeMode,layoutFlow,layoutGrid,layoutGridChar,layoutGridLine,layoutGridMode,layoutGridType,lineBreak,msBlockProgression,msInterpolationMode,scrollbar3dLightColor,scrollbarArrowColor,scrollbarBaseColor,scrollbarDarkShadowColor,scrollbarFaceColor,scrollbarHighlightColor,scrollbarShadowColor,scrollbarTrackColor,styleFloat,textAutospace,textJustifyTrim,textKashida,textKashidaSpace,writingMode,zoom,getAttribute,removeAttribute,setAttribute,alignmentBaseline,background,backgroundAttachment,backgroundClip,backgroundColor,backgroundImage,backgroundOrigin,backgroundPosition,backgroundRepeat,backgroundSize,baselineShift,border,borderBottom,borderBottomColor,borderBottomLeftRadius,borderBottomRightRadius,borderBottomStyle,borderBottomWidth,borderCollapse,borderColor,borderLeft,borderLeftColor,borderLeftStyle,borderLeftWidth,borderRadius,borderRight,borderRightColor,borderRightStyle,borderRightWidth,borderSpacing,borderStyle,borderTop,borderTopColor,borderTopLeftRadius,borderTopRightRadius,borderTopStyle,borderTopWidth,borderWidth,bottom,boxShadow,boxSizing,captionSide,clear,clip,clipPath,clipRule,color,content,counterIncrement,counterReset,cssFloat,cssText,cursor,direction,display,dominantBaseline,emptyCells,fill,fillOpacity,fillRule,font,fontFamily,fontSize,fontSizeAdjust,fontStretch,fontStyle,fontVariant,fontWeight,glyphOrientationHorizontal,glyphOrientationVertical,height,kerning,left,length,letterSpacing,lineHeight,listStyle,listStyleImage,listStylePosition,listStyleType,margin,marginBottom,marginLeft,marginRight,marginTop,marker,markerEnd,markerMid,markerStart,mask,maxHeight,maxWidth,minHeight,minWidth,msTransform,msTransformOrigin,opacity,orphans,outline,outlineColor,outlineStyle,outlineWidth,overflow,overflowX,overflowY,padding,paddingBottom,paddingLeft,paddingRight,paddingTop,pageBreakAfter,pageBreakBefore,pageBreakInside,parentRule,pointerEvents,position,quotes,right,rubyAlign,rubyOverhang,rubyPosition,stopColor,stopOpacity,stroke,strokeDasharray,strokeDashoffset,strokeLinecap,strokeLinejoin,strokeMiterlimit,strokeOpacity,strokeWidth,tableLayout,textAlign,textAlignLast,textAnchor,textDecoration,textIndent,textJustify,textOverflow,textTransform,textUnderlinePosition,top,unicodeBidi,verticalAlign,visibility,whiteSpace,widows,width,wordBreak,wordSpacing,wordWrap,zIndex,getPropertyPriority,getPropertyValue,item,removeProperty,setProperty OK
> js> outputbox.currentStyle.cssText .  \\ 沒這東西
OK
> js> outputbox.currentStyle.backgroundColor . \\ Style 的 attribute 都有
#f0f0f0 OK 
> js> outputbox.currentStyle.backgroundColor=\"#808080\" \\ 不能改動
JavaScript error : NoModificationAllowedError
OK
> js> outputbox.currentStyle.fontSize .
1em OK    

 

 


 


 

如果用 HTML 標準的 style property 則經常看不到東西, 因為 style 是層層噴塗上去的, 光看自己這一層不一定有東西。

lab:
{"name":"lab","readonly":false,"codemode":"true","doc":"研究如何讓 3ce 根據【股號】自動讀取【股票名稱】
[ ] 3ce private/money.f stock-evaluate input simplify to only ID
    --> 由 ID 取得 name 
        o through Excel + e01 + DDE
        o through web sites
    [ ] 列出所有的 table td 看是第幾號
        <js> var i=0; $("td").each(function(){type(i++ + ":" + this.innerText+"\n")})</js>
        62: 114:
        \ 以下這行分別試了兩支股票都對,
        js> $("td")[113].innerText \ ==> 股票名稱 (string)
        js> $("td")[114].innerText \ ==> 遠見 (string)
        \ <nobr> 是所有的欄位, 從 nobr 找到所要的資料是個線索：
        <js> var i=0; $("nobr").each(function(){type(i++ + ":" + this.innerText+"\n")})</js>
        <nobr>股票名稱</nobr>
        34:股票代號
        35:股票名稱
        36:產業別
        37:上市/上櫃
        38:上市
        39:公司名稱
    [ ] 以上 td 113 114 的確可行,試了幾支都對。問題是
        http://goodinfo.tw/StockInfo/BasicInfo.asp?STOCK_ID=2002
        實在太慢了。但不對, 本來就是要看她的網頁, 本來就得等了呀!
","mode":true}
Log 2016-08-16:
{"doc":"[x] How to edit log/archive.json ?
    1. open it in any Web based jeforth.3we application, 3ce is good.
       cls dump log/archive.json
    2. edit the target field edit box and save, the field appears 
       in localStorage now
    3. export --> export entire localStorage to a textarea
    4. edit the exported string by Notepad++
    5. Use Notepad++ plugin JSTool/JSFormat to make it easier to read
    6. Find the target field line. Copy it.
    7. Paste the line to log/archive.json
    8. check it out by : dump log/archive.json
    9. Delet the target field in localStorge through edit box [Delete] button.
   10. -- The End --

[ ] Youtube presentation of numeric.js
[ ] 準備 release master 新版, search "kvm.minor_version"
    全部加 200 代表 GitHub master release 的版號。
    [x] jeforth.3nd.js --> version 2 -> 202
    [x] jeforth.3nw.html, /package.json -> version 22 -> 222
    [x] jeforth.3htm.js --> to be version 2 now -> 202
    [x] jeforth.3ce.js(3ce extension pages)-> 202
    [x] jeforth.3ce, ce.f(Target page) -> 202
    [x] jeforth.3ce, background.js -> 202
    [x] jeforth.hta --> <HTA> tag. to be version 3 now -> 203 
    [ ] GitHub read me should feature the published 3ce Chrome extension.
    [ ] README.md 上的 demo 也要改寫好一點。最好能有浮動 console3we 框。
        --> 先把結構改好, link 出去的內容先弄成 under constructing. 日起有功,穩步推進。

[x] 這行會出問題, \ 帶頭的 command 裡的 ( ... ) 造成的!!
    : is-editbox-field? ( obj -- boolean ) \ Is the object ( probably from localStorage ) an edit box article?
    改這樣就好了:
    : is-editbox-field? ( obj -- boolean ) \ Is the object (probably from localStorage) an edit box article?
    SRP:
    s" ( foo -- bar ) foo ( bar ) " parse-help .s
    --> 發現只要在 parse-help 裡把分離出 stack diagram 的 match 弄成 non-greedy 亦即
        加個 ? 就好了。
[x] ls.f redefined "(dump)" and "dump" while see used "(dump)" that is called by
    name! That puts "see" in trouble. Solution is letting "see" to call "(dump)"
    by reference instead of by name. Same risk on jeforth.f "be" and "bp" have
    been modified to be call-by-reference. Some other cases that are also call
    -by-name but those names do not look like being reused so I don't worry.

[x] 整頓 editor.f 剔除一些可以被 ls.f 取代的命令, 只剩下 Hyper Text Editor Alt-F2 這
    部分, 其他的 log.save log.open 直接把 outputbox 當成 editor 不要了; tr 也不要了。
    [x] HTE's [bigger][smaller] buttons are covered by {F10}{F9}, so 
        remove them.
    [x] 保存舊的 editor.f , [x] 改名成 hte.f 或者 [/] 併入 html5.f 哪個好?
        --> try 併入 html5.f ... 不行, 有用到 unindent.f 
    [x] old editor.f code saved to archive.json
[ ] 3ce target page 裡, 功能少很多。 hte.f load 不進來。
